compiledCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

Properties.Name: remotion-api-prod | Validate request body and querystring parameters

/Users/manu/work/02_yourvideoengine/remo.serviceRawFile:
service: remotion-api

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x
  region: us-east-1
  timeout: 29
  deploymentBucket:
    name: manu-remotion-deployments
  environment:
    REMOTION_ENV: ${opt:stage, 'dev'}
  iam:
    role:
      statements:
        - Effect: Allow
          Action:
            - logs:CreateLogGroup
            - logs:CreateLogStream
            - logs:PutLogEvents
            - logs:TagResource
            - lambda:InvokeFunction
            - lambda:GetFunction
            - s3:*
            - ssm:*
          Resource: "*"

functions:
  renderVideo:
    handler: handler.renderVideo
    events:
      - http:
          path: render
          method: post

  getStatus:
    handler: handler.getStatus
    events:
      - http:
          path: status
          method: get
          request:
            parameters:
              querystrings:
                renderId: true

custom:
  stages:
    - dev
    - prod
